description:
#1 GOLF APP WORLDWIDE 5YRS IN A ROW
FREE GPS, 3D COURSES, SCORES-STATS 
GOLF DIGEST TIPS, GOLFNOW TEE TIME 
DISCOUNTS, DOWNLOAD NOW IT'S FREE

NEW!  Check-out the GolfNow Tee Time Discounts that are exclusive to GolfLogix members only:

1. All GolfLogix members (Free-Club and Champion) get 20% off any GolfNow hot deal tee time (up to 4 players) at 5,000+ courses worldwide.

2. All Champion members get an additional $20 off a GolfNow hot deal tee time.  So the cost of the Champion membership is 100% covered by the new GolfNow $20 off discount.  It's a no-brainer!

With GolfLogix you get:

FREE GOLF GPS distances on any course in the world

FREE yardage book color 3D course images

FREE 4-player scoring, stats and handicap

Download GolfLogix, the #1 Golf App.  Why not?  It’s FREE

It gets even better...

Track your stats and get MyGolfDigest after every round showing personalized lessons and analysis of your game from Golf Digest’s top teachers including Mickelson, Harmon, Leadbetter, Haney and more

Free access to 60+ years of Golf Digest archived lessons and videos

Exclusive deals on golf equipment and gear in the Golfsmith Pro Shop 

Live 24/7 streaming Golf News feed with tournament leaderboards

Upgrade to a Champion member for less than $20 and get and additional $20 tee time discount from GolfNow and a $20 off coupon from Golfsmith.  $40 in savings for a $19.99 upgrade.  It pays to be a GolfLogix Champion member!

The GolfLogix Golf GPS app is EASY, FAST, FUN and best of all, it’s FREE!

GPS to the Front, Back and Center of Greens

Daily Pin Positions

Target distance to any point on the Fairway and Green

GPS to all Layups and Hazards

Video Flyovers of every hole

Patented Club Tracking showing the location and distance of every club you hit

Club Distance Grid shows where each of your clubs should land from where you are standing on the hole

Digital Yardage Book with pin point notes that you can place anywhere on the hole

Calorie Counter

There is so much to the GolfLogix App, you’re gonna love it!

GolfLogix is the world leader in Golf GPS software since 1999

See why millions of golfers trust GolfLogix for their game

Download GolfLogix, the #1 Golf App right now!

Below are descriptions and terms of the OPTIONAL in-app upgrades:

1.  GolfLogix Champion Membership is a one-year subscription membership for $19.99.
2.  MyGolfDigest gives you unlimited lessons after every round can be purchased for either $0.99/mo or $9.99/yr.

Payment for in-app upgrades will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.  Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.  Your iTunes Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the original subscription amount. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.  No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use are located at: http://golflogix.com/Terms_of_Use.aspx.
